website_summaries.verdict: Tough football that will hold its shape well because of high-quality lining.
pros: Available in 3 different sizes of junior, pee-wee, and official to meet needs of different age players
Surface has deeper pebbling for a tighter grip
Uses 3-ply bladder and multilayer construction to hold air well
cons: Surface material is harder than some others

customer_reviews.title: good size for 8 yr old boys
customer_reviews.text: pee wee size a little bigger than expected, but 8 yr olds were still able to throw/catch it. the distance from the tip of my thumb to tip of my pinkie is about 8.25 inches and it fits my hand perfectly. comes fully inflated and it has endured several days of play including drops on cement and punt kicks without issue. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: booshleeg

customer_reviews.title: tackified like a bowling ball
customer_reviews.text: Description says it's tackified. Yeah, tackified like a bowling ball. Pretty much zero grip on this ball. It feels like a worn out football. Very disappointed. One star b/c it's cheap, and you won't care if you throw it around on the street and it gets scuffed. It'll probably be better for the ball if it does get scuffed up. It might give it some grip.
customer_reviews.author: Tedrock

customer_reviews.title: Great to play catch with your kids.
customer_reviews.text: My son is ten and this fits his hand great easy to catch and throw for him and thats what matters it is small for an adult hand but that’s a given, but as long as you can get your kids out of the house and off the electronics it’s worth every penny the kids today are addicted to being in doors etc I’m almost 40 I don’t understand it when we were kids we never wanted to be in the house. This was a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mike poland

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Great feel, Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball! It looks and feels quality. The stitching on the lacing is well done! It's made of leather, so don't expect it to hold up if you're throwing on something rough like pavement, but in the grass park, ours has held up wonderfully! Bought this for my 7yr old to practice with since he joined the local flag-football league. I mistakenly got the wrong size, so if it's for a league, make sure you get the appropriate size for what they'll be playing!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: For the price its good👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: For about $8.00 you can get this Offical size football, you cant beat that. Its not an amazing NFL replica or anything. But its 1/10th the price and it meets what it claims to be, if you need an extra ball to throw around on game day or just want an extra football the house. Its a good match. I will note that it did feel sticky when i got it, i ran it under warm water and washed it off and now its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cody r.

customer_reviews.title: Simple cheap but functional
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality football but I wasn't looking for anything fancy just a ball to toss around in the backyard. It definitely feels a little cheap but that's okay because I didn't pay much for it so it is cheap. Only real complaint is that there are a couple strings hanging out of the seams that had to be cut off. Other than that it is a good ball and is cheap enough if it gets lost or chewed up by our puppy it won't be a big deal!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for both children and adults and especially if you invite friends and family over.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I just got this football yesterday in the mail and I have to say this came to the house earlier then intended and clearly I think this football is the perfect size for both children and adults, especially if you invite your friends over or on occassions where you're playing football with your child and/ or partener. I also think this is great for people who live in rural areas because backyards in rural areas are definitely big enough to play football or vollyball in.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for a neighnor's son who loves sports. I dropped it off at their house on Christmas Eve so it could be opened early Christmas day. On Christmas, saw him outside throwing the football with his dad. When he saw me, he ran up to me and gave me the biggest hug and said "thank you". Based on that, I would say that he loved the football.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Blue 42! Hut Hut
customer_reviews.text: All about that 2 hand touch game? Get your hands on this ball. Legit size and feel. The outer skin has remained in good condition after being stored inside and left outdoors occasionally. Just remember to dry it off if it gets moist and the texture should remain good. It does scuff if it hits pavement hard so be aware of that. Perfect for backyard or driveway games or tossing around at half time. I got it on sale for <$20. What a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Tomasito

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 7 year old football fan
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my 7 year old son. He is really into football and enjoys tossing the ball with anyone who is willing to play. It is a harder ball than what he was used to so he's taken a few in the nose, but has improved because of it. Nerf balls are great, but they are easier to catch and my son needed something more legit to determine what his skill level really was. Also, it's perfect for small hands and is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nic McTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a week
customer_reviews.text: It was received defective. Unfortunately we didn't notice until my son took it out for kicking practice and on the 3rd kick the seam split. You can see in the photo there is some sort of defect workmanship under the seam.
customer_reviews.author: QBee

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a Rubber Ball
customer_reviews.text: Its a football. I must have missed where it said this is a rubber ball that's just colored brown with some texture. Don't expect cushioned composite feel. Feels like a toy. Edit - 9/28/16: After wearing this ball in for a few weeks, it feels much better. It may have had some coating on it from the factory that just needed to be worn in. If you get the right price, I'd say buy it. Obviously its not the best football out there, but for the money its a bargain. I also have their smaller sized ball which is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: R & K

customer_reviews.title: The ball I received is different than the picture and the ball is slippery.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this ball because it was very slippery where the writing is (which is about half of the ball). We went went a Wilson K2 ball which was much better for gripping. I saw this ball at Walmart and Meier and passed it up because it was slippery so the picture being different than the actual ball is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Yeah 😎 I love it ♥️🏈💙
customer_reviews.text: I snagged this nice ball during a lightning deal at $7.99 😁 since I occasionally play on a co-ed flag football team. 🤣 lol I thought it would be nice to always have my own football in my gym bag as an extra just in case we would need to play with it during a game 👌😁👍🏈
customer_reviews.author: Tyra White

customer_reviews.title: Are you ready for some football?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect football. I bought it when it was 10$ and with that price, how could you not buy it? I've had Wilson footballs my whole life and they never disappoint. There is no need to buy the 30$ balls. This Wilson official size is the perfect size for 8th graders up to adults. It'll last a lifetime if you take care of it. Don't sit on the balls or leave it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: A great football for the house and street!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty inexpensive and something to throw around with your child. Holds up pretty well in street ball. Not a ball I would leave outside in the elements, but very durable. Has a regular sized pin hole for easy air filling when necessary with a regular hand pump and needle. I've had it for 3 months now and have yet to need to fill with air! Little hands seem to be able to grip it very well, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jewlz

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Ball is little slippery but for the price it’s a great ball. I coach youth flag football and these are the size ball they use so I have 6 these using for practice and working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: One heck of a nice FB!
customer_reviews.text: My eleven and seven year olds each have an arm like Brett Favre. Well, that’s what he told us so... Anyway, this is an outstanding ball for the price. We play ball nearly every day, my boys and I, and this is the BEST ball we’ve ever had, bar none! Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Fisher

customer_reviews.title: An overall great football for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backyard football. While it is not "The Duke", it is constructed very well and is very durable. I have played with it in the ocean, the lake, sand, dirt, grass and no problems to speak of. It has always held its air and I don't believe I have ever had to add any extra. I have smalish hands to I love the "tackified" grip....it gives me the little extra grip I need to throw a spiral (I am pretty much a grown man with little girl hands). A great overall football!
customer_reviews.author: Casey JonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for an outdoor football
customer_reviews.text: If you want a football you can throw around outside and not worry about getting it wet, hitting gravel, or scuffing, get this. Its durable covering is not leather, but it feels not too far off from the real McCoy. It feels good, is the right size, and the cost can't be beat. We use it for playing in our yard and if the ball gets thrown into the gravel area - or even the pool - no tears are shed! We're ordering a second one it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: DDB in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice football for the money
customer_reviews.text: For a cheaper priced football I was impressed, nice grip and seems are nice and straight. I am happy with the purchase, also I got next day delivery free
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O'Mara

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: Standard official sized football. It does not feel super cheap or anything. It is pretty big , i guess i usually get the size smaller, but mayne i just need to man up, i dont know.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: The quality and grip is great and seems to have the same quality as my ...
customer_reviews.text: My son began playing flag football this year and we wanted a pee-wee size football at home so we could practice with it and get him used to the size and feel and work on his catching and throwing skills. The quality and grip is great and seems to have the same quality as my full size NFL football but just in a smaller size. If you're looking for a pee-wee football this is perfect. This football was half the price on here than it was in the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. QUINN

customer_reviews.title: Huck it, Chuck it, FOOTBALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a real deal, officially sized football to toss around with your older son or friends than this is the one for you. Before you start tossing the ole pig skin around tho be sure to weather it first. I have some fine dirt behind my house that I just rubbed into it real good to get rid of that slick, new, hard to handle, slippery feel on the ball. Once you do that, it's nice to grip and keep a hold of it while dodging Fred that's trying to blitz you because Hank and John suck at blocking!!
customer_reviews.author: Gifted Guy

customer_reviews.title: Won't get flat unless you intend it to! ;)
customer_reviews.text: The game changer. What the pros use. Tradition. I love football and finally decided to get one. I have used this ball in intramural games & tournaments and just to toss around, of course. It's the quintessential football. Spins in a tight spiral and great to catch. The bladder is well made and really keeps its pressure (sorry, Tom). I have only had to pump it up once and I've had it for 10 months. 10 months of heavy usage, too.
customer_reviews.author: GBrink

customer_reviews.title: Good grip, but kinda cheap
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was more than happy with this football. It was the right size, had a good grip, and was easy to throw. But after tossing it around for a few months, the seams are falling apart. If I was a NFL superstar who never dropped the ball, that probably wouldn't be a problem. But, since I'm just an average Joe, it has seen more than its fare share of grounding. The football might survive well enough if dropped on a nice soft yard, but we throw it out on the street where the asphalt has slowly worn away the seams. I will not be buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Outlook

customer_reviews.title: Bad feel
customer_reviews.text: This is no NFL quality football, obviously, but I played with better footballs when I was 10. I guess I expected more as far as quality goes, but oh well. It works and doesn't leak. Just should have paid more for better leather.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Touchdown!
customer_reviews.text: Good ball as described by many other reviewers. I'm not much of a football player but my son plays football and he was so happy I got it for him. He's been playing with his friends more since I got it for him and would always ask me to toss the ball with him after a football game on Sunday. He's playing more and is more active that I got it for him instead of sitting around and playing video games. This is a touchdown with a 2pt conversion in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Ice fisher

customer_reviews.title: Leather ripped after a week
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry but I have to leave a one-star review. I like Wilson brand and I expected durability from this company. I used this ball for a total of 3 times and the leather ripped apart. Note I never overinflated the ball. I am very disappointed and dissatisfied. This is potentially dangerous. If the ball explodes the moment I punt, then it is highly likely that I will tear my ACL.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Z

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good value!
customer_reviews.text: This ball has a softer texture and is nubby, so it's easier for pre-teen sized hands to use. Shipped in manufacturers box. My nephew is going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: SanInUtah

customer_reviews.title: Looks great after hitting the street numerous times
customer_reviews.text: My college aged son loved getting this football and we played catch with it on Christmas day. It seems to be high quality as it hit the street several times without leaving a scuff. He and his buddies play in several touch football leagues at school and he said this football is better than any of many they used.
customer_reviews.author: BCF Ice

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Secret adopt-a-family gift unsure of quality, durability but good price. It looked like good quality when I received it and hope he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lavita Davies

customer_reviews.title: great grip, great football
customer_reviews.text: great football, i will buy more...outstanding grip...my 6 year old catches and throws this football like a pro!!! better than a nerf because of the easy grip...I thought a nerf would be better because I was afraid my son would miss it and get hit in the face, the grip is so good...it is like catching a ball with stick'em on your hands...great great grip!!!
customer_reviews.author: dan boyer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, but work great for practice balls
customer_reviews.text: Very simple footballs, but work great for about 10 of them to practice kicking. Had a former football kicker (when they won the national championships) use these to show my daughter how to kick--was still able to kick a 45 yard field goal.
customer_reviews.author: Chanimal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - leaked after one use
customer_reviews.text: Legit used one time and it started leaking air. Complete waste of money and returned promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: Hell of a deal.
customer_reviews.text: It's great for playing some simple catch and throw while you're out with your friends and family. Looks cheap and the grip is a bit disappointing but really you can't complain for the price. I snagged this one for $7.99 It was either this or a $65 official ball. Anything in between isn't even worth the extra money. This works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - durable
customer_reviews.text: I used this item for a student store. Students loved the balls!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Hansen

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: This football is beloved by a young family. They take it everywhere and play with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: happy2live

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for orphanage in Imuris, Sonora. I'm sure the kids will enjoy this. It seemed to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Redhouse

customer_reviews.title: Fun dad and son play
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old was very excited to receive this for Christmas. It's pretty big for him to hold onto and I kinda wish I would've bought a junior sized ball but he doesn't seem to mind!
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect football for little hands
customer_reviews.text: Brown, oblong shape, leather like surface, laces and print on the sides. Some stitching. Seriously, this is a good football for kids and seems built to last. It easily made it through the first season we had it and it seems like it will last for many more years. Good size for little ones to learn how to throw and catch.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves it. It is a Wilson product so I knew the quality would be great and it is.
customer_reviews.author: Preppers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have had it since Christmas and it is holding up very good. I use maybe 2 to 4 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-a-roni

customer_reviews.title: Dogs can't play football
customer_reviews.text: Dog popped it really quick. Do not give to your german shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: Krdskoor

customer_reviews.title: Brady would approve.
customer_reviews.text: I’m no better throwing touchdowns with this even though it says MVP right on it. It works though and the kids seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Good ball and has held up for four years.
customer_reviews.text: I have played a few games with it over four years but mainly catch at work during lunch or when I need the air. Ball is super easy to catch. It just sticks to your hands which is great cause we are playing catch - not drop. I have played with a lot of skill levels with the ball - nobody complained and most folks said 'Where did you get this ball?' If you buy one, put your name on it cause it will walk away if you don't.
customer_reviews.author: The Philistines

customer_reviews.title: Yes buy this
customer_reviews.text: Yes this has sure taken a beating in the two weeks I have bought it for my 9 yo son I haven't had to fill it up and it still looks new great ball
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Really nice ball
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Angel Tree gift. It looked and felt substantial. I was really surprised how nice it was for the $5 I paid. Although I don't know how the child liked it, it really seemed like a good value for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good football for both peewee and junior players
customer_reviews.text: The main problem with this ball is that it loses air fairly quickly and needs to be pumped up too often.
customer_reviews.author: Gail N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our garter toss!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use this for the garter toss for our wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Mantlo

customer_reviews.title: loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a keeper. My 9-year-old son loves his football. And it was affordable.
customer_reviews.author: micaela

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Football
customer_reviews.text: Just a good quality, sturdy ball. Stands up to a lot of punishment without losing much if any air.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Plowden

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect ball to have around the house for playing catch on the beach or when your friends are over. Its not the highest quality ball, and if you are looking for this to be an everyday use ball you should look elsewhere; however for the armchair QB's out there this is perfect. I ended up getting two, one for the house and one I keep in my car, I'll probably be buying another to leave at the office.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to grandson for Christmas and he was so happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marion Green

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good football.
customer_reviews.text: It felt very comfortable in my hands and had a good grip to it. Another gift for my nephews....Good price seeing how boys will be boys and either lose it or leave it out for the dogs to destroy. At least someone got to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Wilson NFL Football
customer_reviews.text: This football is great! It's probably best for younger kids because this is in no way designed for a more serious type of playing football. The football is made up of a very odd rubber which is great for grip, but far from anything realistic. The stitching on the top is also fake. But, this does not take away from the fact that it's a great football.
customer_reviews.author: T. Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Decent but a bit slippery.
customer_reviews.text: Decent football but despite saying "tackified" the ball is still pretty slippery. So ultimately disappointed in the quality, but not a ton of great options for pee wee size so kept the ball anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Neal NYC

customer_reviews.title: Ok...but can be slick
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, but I wish it was a bit tackier. It's slick where they place the Wilson logo, which is too close to the laces, so it can sometimes make for less grippy throw. Maybe the slickness will wear off with use. Still a decent buy since I don't have to worry about it getting beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Archery Dude

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Football
customer_reviews.text: This threads, flies well and is the football to beat al others. This football really is the best and i'm so happy I purchased it. It flies nice and feels comfortable when catching. I bought this one for my 11 year old son and he loves it. It's exactly what he was looking for. I would totally recommend this football.
customer_reviews.author: Isa1Isa2Me3

customer_reviews.title: Very nice football
customer_reviews.text: Very nice football, I bought it at the discounted price or $9.99, when it came, I hadn't realized how large an official size football is, my hand barely fits around it, just because I have small hands, but this makes in hard to throw the ball well, but over all, I love the durability especially. Highly reccomend purchasing this football, very impressed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W.

customer_reviews.title: Wilson football
customer_reviews.text: This football is very durable and my 10yr old son loves it, however I do recommend buying the Wilson football prep kit to soften it up a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Reader

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The ball looks really nice but has absolutely no grip. I have small hands so for me to use the official size ball I need some sort of grip. Can't pump fake or hold the ball down for longer than 2 seconds. I wanted a cheap ball and it is a cheap ball so I guess I get what I pay for.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra davis

customer_reviews.title: We use in our flag football games, perfect size for young kids
customer_reviews.text: We use this football in our flag football games. It’s an 8U team and this football is the perfect size for those little guys being able to throw the ball down the field. This football has held up great so far. I would purchase again and you see why it’s so popular.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my three young boys
customer_reviews.text: This is much loved by my family! This size is great for my 3, 6, and 8 year olds to play with. I was going to get the junior size but I am so glad I decided to go small with the pee wee. It is a bit big for my 3 year old and perfect for my 6 and 8 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Great for Boys 5-9
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid football great for kids 5-9 learning to throw and catch.
customer_reviews.author: LeicaDog

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for pee-wees
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr olds love this. Perfect size for them. Did come not fully inflated. Thankfully we have a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Priced really well here on Amazon for an NFL sized ball!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This review is for the Pee Wee size. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Pee Wee size. The surface is not as tacky and soft as you would expected from the description or the fact that is says "Tackified" embossed on the front. Also, the big Wilson and MVP logos are really slippery which doesn't help matters.
customer_reviews.author: A. Quon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the football. He thought the football seemed professional. The football is very strong. Just two problems. First of all, the football has more an “okay" kind of grip. Not the best, but not the worst. Second of all, my son didn't like how the ball said “peewee" on his peewee sized football. He thought the football would look cooler without that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sadia

customer_reviews.title: I took this thing half way around the world to play with my nephew and it is fantastic! We have played for hours and the feel ..
customer_reviews.text: What a Ball!!!! I took this thing half way around the world to play with my nephew and it is fantastic! We have played for hours and the feel and grip of the ball is perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Nice football
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this about 6 weeks and it's really nice. Just a good football. It's stayed inflated, has good grip and hadn't presented any problems. He's enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: C. WallaceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved it I thought it would be a bit bigger but that's my fault for not reading all the info still a good product
customer_reviews.author: Staceyandrea

customer_reviews.title: Not Pit Bull tough, but still a great ball!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Pit Bull so she could play football with her dad on Sunday's during halftime. She has been enjoying it throughout the season. It has lasted longer than most her toys,but still has taken a beating! But she loves it, so why not. I will get her a new one for next season!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissia Bent

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and has held up very well with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and has held up very well with a lot of rough play. The only reason I am giving this 4 stars is we were trying to get a pee wee ball for our 5 year old and this ball was a lot larger then the pee wee balls the rest of the children on the team have gotten else where, more the size for a 7 year old would be my guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Brown

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality ball. If you know what you are getting you will be very happy. It is very 'sharp' and hard though so it is a lot harder to catch than a Nerf ball or something like that. So, great if you want a 'real' football. Not as great if you just want a ball to throw around with younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Rant

customer_reviews.title: This ball is the size of a rugby ball in ...
customer_reviews.text: This ball is the size of a rugby ball in circumference. Compared to other footballs this football is 3 inches more in circumference. Also the color is not the same as the one pictured. It is a lighter color, not dark brown as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: CHASE NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Great balls--will make some kids very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice balls, come fully inflated and in a box of sorts. We bought several of these as gifts for needy boys, age 12 to 18. Not to say that girls can't use these but the church need more items for boys.
customer_reviews.author: Motorhome Mama

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: It's a football, no big surprises. The peewee size is great for kids' smaller hands. And this is a good first "real" football when they are ready to move up from something soft like nerf to a leather ball. Solid choice. Should last pretty much forever. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Judd Berube

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in my hands, it looks cool, and it even smells good 😂
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: 9 YR loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this football for my 9 yr old who requested NFL Wilson. My son loves playing with this ball with his dad and brother and is more than happy. Have had it for 2 months now and no complains. Better price on amazon than local Costco warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: BJayPai

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: good quality, i see this lasting a long time! my step son got this for his birthday and loves it. its not cheap material its like the adult footballs, we got him the junior size
customer_reviews.author: cmam

customer_reviews.title: for adults.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old could not even wrap his hand around it. It is for sure, for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: DL T.

customer_reviews.title: Great football - slightly over pumped and hard.
customer_reviews.text: Footballs are the right size and come pumped. They are a little over pumped and need to be worked out again. Overall quite satisfied with the product - just a bit hard.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect, which is to it ok a shelf MD ...
customer_reviews.text: I basically bought this Football , among 5 other different types of Footballs, for when I remodel my 11 Year Old s Bedroom This Month.. Even after reading all of this products reviews I simply did not care only bc it was very cost Effective and it has a doffered look then the others I have ordered. For what I need it for, it's perfect, which is to it ok a shelf MD only look nice lol .. beyond that howevee I would have never ordered it simply because of the tackless, non leathery grip it holds, non existent. Let's put it this way.. my 35 year old husband would have looked @ me and said, 'seriously?!?!' ..
customer_reviews.author: Caterpillar Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo football!
customer_reviews.text: Sick football! Affordable and perfect size ! Cant wait to throw this on christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Fooey

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a boy at his birthday party and haven't heard how it is.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Read

customer_reviews.title: Great for age 7 and up hands
customer_reviews.text: It's a football. My 8 year old son wanted to learn how to play so I purchased him this. It's still sitting in his toy box. It looks just like the picture. Great for ages 7 and up.
customer_reviews.author: MOM OF  3Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Peewee size is perfect for first grader.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my first grade grandson. Got peewee as recommended for his age and it is perfect size—doesn’t look or feel too babyish to him and he is able to grip and throw. He’s very excited!
customer_reviews.author: Retreat

customer_reviews.title: Official size and good feel.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ball to throw around the backyard, and came fully inflated and ready to go. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Keems

customer_reviews.title: Does it job very well and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: It's a football the kids and I toss it around, it has held up really well, has not broke down, everything has held up great we use it on grass on baseball fields, cement pretty much every type of ground you can think of we have played on it! This ball has taken a beating and not fallen apart!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Good football
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 12 year old son. Plays with it several days a week with his friends. Decent quality. Happy overall with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSki1008

customer_reviews.title: it's WILSON!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 12 year old son's hand good. and it's Wilson. Who makes a better football? Might want to get a pump and a needle though. after a month it loses some air but that's with daily throwing and kicking.
customer_reviews.author: Derek. E

customer_reviews.title: Best 1st Football
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, first "real" football for a kid. My first grade son loves it. We had been using Nerfs and other stuff like that, but when it was time to get a "real" football this was it. Wilson makes an excellent product
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one not the balls fault
customer_reviews.text: My son plays with all the neighborhood boys. This is their favorite ball to use. We had one and it got ran over by a car. All the kids were devastated. Thanks to Amazon I had another within days!
customer_reviews.author: K. Howe

customer_reviews.title: FOOTBALL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Easy to grip with or without football gloves, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel_05_NC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to toss or kick around, pund intended.
customer_reviews.text: just wanted a cheap, real size football to toss around & mimic like i was a NFL pro, for sure not the real expensive NFL ball but just want I wanted & needed.
customer_reviews.author: TNN

customer_reviews.title: American Football
customer_reviews.text: fantastic American Football!!!It's resistant,easy to inflate and durable!I offered on eto my dog for playing!she played with it a very long time! even if it's not recommended by the maker i used to enjoy offering this kind of ball to my dog for Playing!!! it wa sso excited playing us football with me!of course it did no tlast for ever but it's very resistant anyway!a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Obi-Wan

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This football didn't even stay inflated for a week. I used a pressure gage and inflated to exactly the pressure stated on the ball and it just won't stay pressurized.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Great football.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect football for Elementary aged kids to play in the snow, rain and mud. My son has brought it to school all winter for recess use, and it shows no effects of use. Very good grip as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ian H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality - good grip to it
customer_reviews.text: Nice football. Good quality. Thrown it around quite a bit on the street and grass and is holding up fine. Good feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: H Clark
